76.customerMessage1: My chain doesn't have th 18k stamped on it

76.SystemMessage55: Template used: "Are your gold plated items stamped?"; last updated: 2022-08-03 15:04:19.181
76.AgentMessage1: GLD: Thanks for reaching out and I'm sorry for the confusion. Our Solid Gold items are stamped with the number of karats they contain. Our Vermeil pieces start with a .925 Sterling Silver base metal and are stamped to reflect that. The rest of our items (Yellow/White/Rose Gold Plated), don't contain a stamp, only our logo. I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Don't ESC if they get an error with the fs code while logged in
templates: For free shipping retroactive code requests, use SRP shortcut
For holiday/extended returns - use the template
dos_and_donts: Close the convo once the client takes over

77.customerMessage1:
Hi Taylor , Please find out if you're actually going to have the Buckley back in Natural leather  any time soon or is it discontinued. The ones you still have are not my size. I have the Navy and it's now worn down so I can't wear them anymore. 
Thank you  in advance, Carol Strauser
77.AgentMessage1: Birkenstock: Thanks for reaching out, and I'm sorry to hear that your size is currently out of stock. I don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend signing up on the product page so you're notified the second it comes back in! Could you also share what size and color you're looking for? In the meantime, what do you think about this instead? - https://birkenstock.attn.tv/aidWWJPtxg89
77.customerMessage2: Black , Gray & Navy if I can't get mine re soled.  I have White. I'm only interested in the Natural
77.SystemMessage35: Template used: "Where can I get repairs done? "; last updated: 2024-11-21 21:52:45.606
77.AgentMessage2:
Birkenstock: Birkenstock footwear can be repaired for various types of damage or wear depending on the style. 

An authorized repair shop would be able to evaluate your footwear and give you an estimate for the necessary repairs. To locate an authorized Birkenstock Repair Shop please use our Store Locator: https://birkenstock.attn.tv/alwtu0MUGHS8 and look for the word Repair or Cobbler next to the shop name. 

If your zip code does not bring up a repair shop near you, please contact any of the locations below for mail-in repairs: 

Michelangelo's 866.337.4637
https://birkenstock.attn.tv/aQQ2Y5X0Hh_3

Resole America 888.349.7463
https://birkenstock.attn.tv/a1aHI0mXRI8J/ 

NuShoe 877.687.4631
https://birkenstock.attn.tv/aW3UTnLIF2OL/

Ibirks 970.459.0940
https://birkenstock.attn.tv/aOrqxUtKEA3A/

escalate: Before you ESC use ESC shortcut
When ESC code issues, add the code to the escalation notes
Always add the customer's name in your esc notes
tone: Don't respond if the customer doesn't want to engage
templates: For inquiries regarding their order updates/status/tracking, use UPD shortcut
